text: Karin Singer (born 14 May 1966) is a former synchronized swimmer from Switzerland. She competed in both the women's solo and the women's duet competitions at the 1984 and . == References == Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss synchronized swimmers Category:Olympic synchronized swimmers of Switzerland Category:Synchronized swimmers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Synchronized swimmers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Synchronized swimmers at the 1986 World Aquatics Championships
title: Karin Singer
